title: P2P Offer Create (response)
description: Returns the information of the created  P2P (Peer to Peer) offer.

p2p_offer_create.title: p2p_offer_create
p2p_offer_create.description: The information of the created P2P offer.

type.description: Whether this is a buy or a sell.

account_currency.description: Currency for this offer. This is the system currency to be transferred between agent and client.

amount.description: The total amount specified in offer, in `account_currency`. It is only visible for agents.

amount_display.description: The total amount specified in offer, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places. It is only visible for agents.

country.description: The target country code of the offer.

created_time.description: The offer creation time in epoch.

is_active.description: The activation status of the offer.

local_currency.description: Local currency for this offer. This is the form of payment to be arranged directly between agent and client.

max_amount.description: Maximum order amount specified in offer, in `account_currency`. It is only visible for agents.

max_amount_display.description: Maximum order amount specified in offer, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places. It is only visible for agents.

max_amount_limit.description: Maximum order amount at this time, in `account_currency`.

max_amount_limit_display.description: Maximum order amount at this time, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places.

min_amount.description: Minimum order amount specified in offer, in `account_currency`. It is only visible for agents.

min_amount_display.description: Minimum order amount specified in offer, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places. It is only visible for agents.

min_amount_limit.description: Minimum order amount at this time, in `account_currency`.

min_amount_limit_display.description: Minimum order amount at this time, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places.

offer_description.description: Notes from the agent. Should include contact details and payment instructions.

offer_id.description: The unique identifier for this offer.

price.description: Cost of the offer in local currency.

price_display.description: Cost of the offer in local currency, formatted to appropriate decimal places.

rate.description: Conversion rate from account currency to local currency.

rate_display.description: Conversion rate from account currency to local currency, formatted to appropriate decimal places.

remaining_amount.description: Amount currently available for orders, in `account_currency`. It is only visible for agents.

remaining_amount_display.description: Amount currently available for orders, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places. It is only visible for agents.

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
